rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Minimalist design with clean lines, natural stone finishes; adheres to Vastu by orienting the entrance slightly towards the east.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with minimalistic decor, large windows for optimal daylight; central courtyard visible from open plan layout.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, designed for intimate dining experiences with a focus on natural light and an uncluttered space.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern minimalist kitchen integrated into living area; functional layout optimized per Indian residential norms with an emphasis on energy efficiency.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest room designed for privacy; minimalistic design that reflects local aesthetics and Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Quiet, secluded area dedicated to reading and study, utilizing natural lighting with thoughtful use of space, and incorporating traditional Indian elements.

openings.description: Large entry door designed for easy access; positioned per Vastu guidelines ensuring positive energy flow.
Multiple window openings to enhance ventilation, natural light, and maintain a minimalist aesthetic; strategically placed for optimal Vastu alignment.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master suite with an adjoining bathroom and walk-in closet; designed to promote relaxation with minimalistic features and soft colors.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom, offering ample space for personal use while aligning with minimalist design principles.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Well-designed bathroom integrated within the master suite; features functional fixtures and ample lighting in line with Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Balcony area providing access to the central courtyard from the upper floor, promoting airflow and natural light.
Elegant and functional staircase connecting ground floor and first floor, designed with minimalist aesthetics in mind.

courtyard.description: Central courtyard that acts as a focal point of the villa, ensuring ventilation and natural light to all adjacent rooms; integrates seamlessly with both floors following Vastu principles.

levels.description: Rooftop terrace designed for relaxation and entertainment, offering panoramic views and an open-air experience in a minimalist style.

fencing.description: Secure fencing around the plot to ensure privacy and safety.

parking.description: Dedicated parking space for two vehicles, located near the entrance per local norms.
